strapiPost.title: Slip Into Something Different at Lady Slipper in Downtown Bentonville
strapiPost.content:
Last week we were able to visit the highly anticipated Lady Slipper in Downtown Bentonville, and it thoroughly exceeded our expectations.

  • Come and find me: A speakeasy lounge and restaurant situated in the basement of Bentonvilleâ€™s historic Massey building, its unassuming location invites you to find it for yourself.
  • Stay a while: Once underground, you're exposed to a tasteful selection of drinks, food, and art. Some of our favorites were the meat and cheese board and their namesake Smash Burger, all chased down with one of their signature cocktails.

For some date night or after-work happy hour ideas, you should check out their IG HERE.
